text: Maria Tsien (February 4, 1925 â€“ November 2, 2020), also known as Marie Tsien McClay, was a Filipina-American actress and philanthropist. She was born in Manila, the Philippines. Her career lasted from 1954 to 1964. She appeared in Asian-related minor roles. She was best known for her roles in One-Eyed Jacks, All the Young Men and Brushfire. Tsien died on November 2, 2020 at her home in Los Angeles at the age of 95. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1925 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American philanthropists Category:Actors from Manila Category:Filipino philanthropists
title: Maria Tsien
